<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Routers</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/routers"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Create router associated with the user's instance.
